subject: Horse Racing
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
Breeders' Cup (Horse Race)
lead_paragraph: Without the trainer Charles Dickey, Flat Out, who is among the likely favorites for the $5 million Breeders’ Cup Classic, would have probably been retired by now.
snippet: Without the trainer Charles Dickey, Flat Out, who is among the likely favorites for the $5 million Breeders’ Cup Classic, would have probably been retired by now.
